meta.dc:title: 114 S. 325 ENR: To amend the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children Act to extend the deadline for a report by the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children, and for other purposes.
meta.dc:creator: U.S. Senate
meta.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

preface.congress: One Hundred Seventeenth Congress of the United States of America
preface.enrolledDateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Sunday, the third day of January, two thousand and twenty one

longTitle.officialTitle: To amend the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children Act to extend the deadline for a report by the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children, and for other purposes.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: ALYCE SPOTTED BEAR AND WALTER SOBOLEFF COMMISSION ON NATIVE CHILDREN REPORT.
section.content: Section 3(f) of the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children Act (Public Law 114–244; 130 Stat. 987) is amended, in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking “3 years” and inserting “5 years”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
